arts.ttl: Galatasaray accuses Jose Mourinho of making racist comments after Turkish league game
arts.sum: Galatasaray plans to start criminal proceedings against Jose Mourinho and file complaints with soccer’s governing body after accusing the Fenerbahce coach of making racist comments after a Turkish league game. His comments regarding Turkish referees and the Galatasaray bench following Monday’s match between the top two teams in the domestic league sparked further criticism.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray to report Mourinho for 'racist' remarks
arts.sum: Turkish Süper Lig leaders Galatasaray said they will "initiate criminal proceedings" and report Fenerbahçe manager Jose Mourinho to FIFA and UEFA over what they call "racist statements."

arts.ttl: Galatasaray accuse Mourinho of making 'racist statements'
arts.sum: Galatasaray said they would "initiate criminal proceedings" against Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho after claiming he made "racist statements" following the teams' 0-0 draw on Monday.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray accuse Mourinho of making 'racist statements'
arts.sum: Galatasaray say they intend to bring criminal proceedings over "racist statements" made by Fenerbahce head coach Jose Mourinho towards Turkish people.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray to initiate criminal proceedings against Jose Mourinho
arts.sum: Since the commencement of his managerial duties in Türkiye, Fenerbahçe manager Jose Mourinho has persistently issued derogatory statements directed towards the Turkish people. As is always the case, the game was played with a backdrop of tension after Fenerbahçe recently accused their city rivals of destroying Turkish football with a post on social media claiming that Galatasaray had: “illicit connections with the press and made insincere statements that keep deceiving the public”.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho pays referee surprise visit after powderkeg derby as Fenerbahce get in hot water ahead of Rangers clash
arts.sum: The 'Intercontinental Derby' showdown with Galatasaray was goalless, with some unsavoury scenes happening off the field

arts.ttl: Galatasaray 0-0 Fenerbahce: Jose Mourinho booked after Victor Osimhen 'silence' gesture sparks confrontation
arts.sum: Galatasaray will be the happier of the two rivals after a goalless draw in the Istanbul derby

arts.ttl: Slovenian Vincic to referee Galatasaray v Fenerbahce
arts.sum: The Turkish Football Federation appoints Slovenian referee Slavko Vincic to officiate Monday's game between Galatasaray and Fenerbahce.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray vs Fenerbahce: Most valuable Süper Lig combined XI
arts.sum: One of the biggest derby games in the world takes place tonight as Galatasaray and Fenerbahce renew their intense rivalry. Turkish football has a fanatical following and the two biggest...

arts.ttl: Galatasaray vs Fenerbahce Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: It’s the Intercontinental Derby in the Super Lig this evening as league leaders Galatasaray host Fenerbahce. Ahead of the game, we’ve made a prediction for the game, provided our predicte...
